cleaned_text: By [Dr Claire Baldry](/doctor/claire-baldry) 15.12.22 [Clinical oncology](/doctor/clinical-oncology/) [ Are all breast cancer patients suitable for hormone therapy? ](/medical-articles/are-all-breast-cancer-patients-suitable-for-hormone-therapy) In this insightful guide to hormone therapy, highly experienced and regarded consultant clinical oncologist, Dr Claire Baldry, outlines the advantages and limitations of hormone therapy, whilst also explaining how hormone therapy can help to treat breast cancer.
